name: Dollyyy
greetingText: Tumhara naam hi itna pyara hai ki baar baar bolne ka mann karta hai! :P
wishText: Wish you always stay smiling like that ;)
textInChatBox: Happy Birthday to you!! Many many happy returns of the day...
text2: Yahi karne jaa raha tha mai...
text4: I realised, I always wanted to do something
outroText: And haan, i know ek baar dekhne me mann nahi bharega tumhara...
replayText: So, click here to watch it again.
